text: saavadhaan! tumahee vo ho ki unase prem karate ho, jabaki ve tumase prem nahin karate aur tum sabhee pustakon par eemaan rakhate ho, jabaki ve jab tumase milate hain, to kahate hain ki ham eemaan laaye aur jab akele hote hain, to krodh se tumapar ungaliyon kee poren chabaate hain. kah do ki apane krodh se mar jao. nihsandeh allaah seenon kee baaton ko jaanata hai
